lines.text: [Masetto pretends to be asleep with his organ hanging out]
Oh, so would I. But do you think he'd object?
Nonsense. He's only a minor worker. He can't object to anything we do.
[after buxom Madam Fantutti threatens to expose Masetto to the fathers and brothers of the virgins he deflowered]
You still work for me. But I have altered the nature of your services.
Fine. You have one hour and I want you back in this bed.
